name: Steins;Gate Gamma
description:
Steins;Gate Gamma takes place between chapters eight and nine of the VN.

The original drama CD follows Okabe when attempting to undo Ruka's D-Mail throws him into a far-removed worldline.

Okabe wakes up finding himself in a dark alley and a bloodied man dead at his feet.
In this worldline, he is a Rounder and many of his enemies and allies are seemingly reversed.

All assets used in this game are made by authors of Steins;Gate visual novel.

Join our Discord to discuss the game here! https://discord.gg/SzrvNmm
